channel.title: Omg so many questions
channel.description:
hi
i know how to make npcs
i know how to be an npc
but nothing else' :|
how do you make my self an ADMIN? how do i make ancients work? how do i make npc's talk? how do you make the teleporting things in the emotions boxes? how do you make the training stuff so that you can get exp? how do you make it so that your lvls start at 1? how do you make wildy in special areas? how do i make ::char work? how do i make ::noclip for NOT to work?
thats it..... if you answer alot of questions for my server... if my server ever gets up.... you will be an administrator :D :D ;D ;D '[br][size=1]Posted on: June 20, 2007, 08:30:00 AM[/size][hr]ohhh yaaa and the most ANNOYING question... how do i make it so that when i attack an npc it doesnt die in one hit....

item.title: Omg so many questions
item.dc:creator: @boondocks9043 boondocks9043
item.description:
@boondocks9043 wrote:

  1. to make yourself an admin go to the character folder click the name you want to be an admin go to rights and highlight the 0 and choose either
    1 for mod
    2 admin
    3 owner
    4 and 5 usually dont apply unless you have clan systems (dont worry about it)

Read full topic
